news.Title: [AI Summary] 精材10月營收年增5.62% 穩步成長
news.Content:
*   精材（3374）公布2025年10月合併營收達7.12億元，較去年同期成長5.62%。
*   公司營運展現穩健增長態勢，營收數字符合市場預期。

**長文報導：**

台灣上櫃半導體廠精材（3374）於2025年11月10日發布最新營運數據，公告2025年10月份合併營收為7.12億元，相較於去年同期的6.74億元，年增率達到5.62%。此營收表現顯示精材在當前市場環境下，營運仍維持穩定的成長動能。

分析師指出，儘管近期全球半導體產業面臨諸多挑戰，包括終端需求變化及庫存調整等因素，精材能持續繳出營收年增的成績，反映其在特定領域的競爭力以及與客戶的穩固合作關係。公司營收的穩健增長，為後續的營運及獲利表現奠定了良好的基礎。

本次公布的營收數字，為投資人及市場分析師提供了重要的參考依據，也再次確認了精材在半導體封測產業中的穩健地位。未來，市場將持續關注精材在技術創新、產能擴充以及新訂單方面的發展，以評估其長期的成長潛力。

**來源：**
[1] [【公告】精材 2025年10月合併營收7.12億元 年增5.62%](https://tw.stock.yahoo.com/news/%E5%85%AC%E5%91%8A-%E7%B2%BE%E6%9D%90-2025%E5%B9%B410%E6%9C%88%E5%90%88%E4%BD%B5%E7%87%9F%E6%94%B67-12%E5%84%84%E5%85%83-%E5%B9%B4%E5%A2%9E5-054214781.html)

news.Title: [AI Summary] Xintec October Revenue Up 5.62% Year-on-Year, Showing Steady Growth
news.Content:
*   Xintec (3374) announced its consolidated revenue for October 2025 reached NT$712 million, a year-on-year increase of 5.62%.
*   The company's operations demonstrate a steady growth trend, with revenue figures meeting market expectations.

**Long Summary:**

Taiwanese fabless semiconductor company Xintec (3374) released its latest operational data on November 10, 2025, announcing a consolidated revenue of NT$712 million for October 2025. This represents a year-on-year increase of 5.62% compared to NT$674 million in the same period last year. This revenue performance indicates that Xintec continues to maintain stable growth momentum in the current market environment.

Analysts point out that despite various challenges facing the global semiconductor industry recently, including changes in end-market demand and inventory adjustments, Xintec's ability to consistently achieve year-on-year revenue growth reflects its competitiveness in specific segments and its strong partnerships with clients. The steady increase in the company's revenue lays a solid foundation for its future operations and profitability.

The announced revenue figures provide important reference points for investors and market analysts, reaffirming Xintec's stable position in the semiconductor packaging and testing industry. The market will continue to monitor Xintec's developments in technological innovation, capacity expansion, and new orders to assess its long-term growth potential.

**Sources:**
[1] [Announcement: Xintec October 2025 Consolidated Revenue NT$712 Million, Up 5.62% Year-on-Year](https://tw.stock.yahoo.com/news/%E5%85%AC%E5%91%8A-%E7%B2%BE%E6%9D%90-2025%E5%B9%B410%E6%9C%88%E5%90%88%E4%BD%B5%E7%87%9F%E6%94%B67-12%E5%84%84%E5%85%83-%E5%B9%B4%E5%A2%9E5-054214781.html)
